Program Curriculam


Week 0

Orientation
Program induction, infrastucture testing, expectation setting, goal alignment,introduction to instructors and cohort, pre-requisite courses

Week 1 - 4

Data Science Foundations
Statistics, sql...

Week 5 - 12

Predictive Modeling
Program induction, infrastructure testing, expectation setting, goal alignment, introduction to instructors and cohort

Week 13 - 16

Programming and Data handling
Python, libtraries, etc. Hands-on progects

Week 17 - 20

Machine Learning
Program induction, infrastructure testing, expectation setting, goal alignment, introduction to instructors and cohort

Week 21 - 24

Capstone Project
Program induction, infrastructure testing, expectation setting, goal alignment, introduction to instructors and cohort





Program Schedule




Mon - Fri: 6.00-6.30 pm

Warm Up
Review previous days work,review today's material before instructions begin

Mon - Fri: 6.30-8.30 pm

Guided Studies
Structured instructor led-work,live classes, project work, active class engagement

Mon - Fri: 8.30-9.00 pm

Project Time
Personal time to catch up on pending work, project execution

Sat : 10.00am - 8.00 pm

Workshop
Hands-on workshop on project implementation,live classes,industry expert talks,mentor connect, collaborative activity and career preparation

Career Services


Along with your rigorous studies, we help you prepare for your interviews and target jobs

Dedicated placement team constantly working with you

Interview prep with specialized courses and mock sessions

Build quality resumes and linkedin/github profiles with our experts

Admission Process


There is a selection process as applications way outnumber our capacity to take students


1. Registration

Complete the registration process with basic details

2. Profile

Fill in details around your profile so we understand you better

3. Entrance Exam

Take the entrance test to prove you are ready to take on the program

4. Entrance Interview

Impress our interview panel that you are the one for the program

5. Enrollment

Choose you cohort and get ready to start the program



Partner and Target Companies

We work with a range of wonderful companies who partner us in the student recruitment process
